Html:
I want to ask about adding image
I know that image can be set using PHPExcel_Worksheet_Drawing, but it has to set the coordinates and path with name before adding them to excel
But my case is I have to put image without knowing the exact position and name of file
also I generate the excel from HTML table so the image will be inside <tr> tag
so how can I add image that inside <tr> to excel ?
